Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns a generated ID, such as us-east-2_zgaEXAMPLE.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user pool, such as arn:aws:cognito-idp:us-east-1:123412341234:userpool/us-east-1_123412341.
A friendly name for the IdP.
The URL of the provider of the Amazon Cognito user pool, specified as a String.
The ID of the user pool.
